info.description: Provides create, retrieve, update and delete (CRUD) services for  Acumos data including solutions, artifacts and users.  All service endpoints require basic HTTP authentication.
info.title: Acumos Common Data Service REST API

get.summary: Gets a page of artifacts, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of artifacts.
Searches for entities with names or descriptions that contain the search term using the like operator; empty if no matches are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Searches for artifacts with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the entity for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the artifact with the specified ID. Cascades delete to related records.

get.summary: Gets the solution revisions that use the specified artifact ID.
Gets a page of catalogs, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new catalog and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URL, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the catalog for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing catalog with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the catalog with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions in the specified catalog, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Adds the specified solution to the specified catalog. Answers bad request if an ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes the specified solution from the specified solution.

get.summary: Gets the list of value set names that can be used to fetch code-name pairs.
Gets the list of code-name pairs for the specified value set. Returns bad request if the value set is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new entity and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the entity for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer groups, optionally sorted.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer-solution membership mappings, optionally sorted.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Grants access for the specified peer group to the specified solution group.

delete.summary: Removes access for the specified peer group to the specified solution group.

get.summary: Gets peers accessible to the specified peer; returns empty if none found.
Gets a page of non-public solutions accessible to specified peer; empty if none found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Checks access for the specified peer to the specified solution.

post.summary: Grants access for the specified principal peer group to the specified resource peer group.

delete.summary: Removes access for the specified principal peer group to the specified resource peer group.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution groups, optionally sorted.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer members of the specified peer group, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Adds the specified peer as a member of the specified peer group.

delete.summary: Drops the specified peer as a member of the specified peer group.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution members in the specified solution group, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Adds the specified solution as a member of the specified solution group.

delete.summary: Drops the specified solution as a member of the specified solution group.

get.summary: Checks the health of the application by querying the database.
Gets a page of notifications, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new notification and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of notifications.

post.summary: Creates a new user notification preference. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets notification preferences for the specified user ID. Returns empty if not found.
Gets the user notification preference for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of active notifications for the specified user; returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the count of unread active notifications for the specified user.

put.summary: Updates an existing notification with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the notification with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Adds a user as a recipient of the notification. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Records the date when the user viewed the notification in the notification-user mapping table. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Drops a user as a recipient of the notification.

get.summary: Gets a page of peers, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new peer and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for peers with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the peer subscription for the specified ID. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing peer subscription with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the peer for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the peer with the specified ID. Cascades delete to peer subscriptions. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets all subscriptions for the specified peer. Returns empty if none are found
Gets count of subscriptions for the specified peer.
Gets a page of publish requests, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new request with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for requests with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the request for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing request with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the request with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the revision description for the specified access type. Returns null if not found.

post.summary: Creates a new description for the specified revision and access type. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the documents for the specified revision and access type.

post.summary: Adds a user document to the specified revision and access type.

delete.summary: Removes a user document from the specified revision and access type.

get.summary: Gets the artifacts for the revision. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds an artifact to the revision. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Removes an artifact from the revision.

get.summary: Gets a page of roles, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of roles.
Searches for roles with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the entity for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the functions for the specified role. Returns empty if none are found.

post.summary: Creates a new entity and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the role function for the specified ID. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new site configuration record. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the site configuration value for the specified key. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing config record with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the config record with the specified key. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new site content record. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the site content value for the specified key. Answers null if the key is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing content record with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the content record with the specified key. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of solutions.
Searches for solutions with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Finds solutions based on specified date, active status and access type query parameters. Limits result to solutions modified after the specified time, expressed in milliseconds since the Epoch.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Searches for entities with names or descriptions that contain the search term using the like operator. Answers empty if none are found.

Finds solutions with attribute values and/or child attribute values matching the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Supports faceted search; i.e., check for kw1 in name, kw2 in description and so on.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Finds solutions matching the specified attribute values and/or child attribute values  with flexible handling of tags to allow all/any matches.  Checks multiple fields for the supplied keywords, including ID, name, description etc.

parameters.name: alltag
parameters.description: All tags, solution must have every one

parameters.name: anytag
parameters.description: Any tags, solution must have at least one

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions matching the specified tag. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Finds user-accessible solutions matching the specified attribute values. Keywords are processed using LIKE-operator search.  Does not search any child entities.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions with the specified user in the ACL, optionally sorted on fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets all child solution IDs used in the specified composite solution. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds a child to the parent composite solution. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Drops a child from the parent composite solution.

get.summary: Gets the solution for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution with the specified ID. Cascades the delete to related entities. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of download records for the specified solution ID. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution download record. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the download with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the image for the specified solution ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Saves a solution image. Returns bad request if the ID is not found or the image is too large.

get.summary: Gets a page of user ratings for the specified solution. Returns empty if none are found.
Gets an existing solution rating. Returns null if not found

post.summary: Creates a new solution rating. Returns bad request on constrain violation etc.

put.summary: Updates an existing entity with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the rating with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets all revisions for the specified solution IDs. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Creates a new revision and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the revision for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing revision with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the revision with the specified ID. Cascades delete to related records. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of deployments for the specified solution and revision IDs. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new deployment record for the specified solution and revision. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing deployment record with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the deployment record with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of deployments for the specified solution, revision and user IDs. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets all tags for the specified solution. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds a tag to the solution. Creates the tag if necessary. Returns bad request if the solution ID is not found.

delete.summary: Drops a tag from the solution. Returns bad request if either is not found.

get.summary: Gets access-control list of users for the specified solution.

post.summary: Adds a user to the ACL for the specified solution. Returns bad request if an ID is not found

delete.summary: Drops a user from the ACL for the specified solution. Returns bad request if an ID is not found

put.summary: Increments the view count of the specified solution (special case of update). Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of step results, optionally sorted on fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new step result with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for requests with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the step result for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing step result with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the step result with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of tags, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new tag. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the tag with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of threads, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new thread and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of threads.
Gets a page of threads for the solution and revision IDs, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of comments for the solution revision, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets comment count for the solution revision.
Gets the count of threads for the solution and revision IDs.
Gets the thread for the specified ID. Returns null if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing thread with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the thread with the specified ID. Cascades to comments in the thread. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of comments in the thread. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new comment and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the number of comments in the thread.
Gets the comment for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing comment with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the comment with the specified ID. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of users, optionally sorted on fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new user and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of users.
Returns a page of users with names that contain the search term matched using a like operator. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Checks the specified credentials for full access. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

Checks the specified credentials for API access. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

put.summary: Adds or removes the specified role for multiple users. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the count of users in a role.
Searches for users with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Checks the specified credentials for verification. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

get.summary: Gets the user for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing user with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the user with the specified ID. Cascades to related entities: roles, logins, notifications. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Changes the user's password to the new value if the user exists, is active, and the old password matches. Returns bad request if not found or not matched.

get.summary: Gets the deployments for the specified user ID. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions which are favorites for the specified user ID. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution favorite record. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution favorite with the specified IDs. Returns bad request if the entity is not found.

get.summary: Gets all login providers for the specified user. Answers empty if none are found.
Gets the login provider for the specified user, provider code and provider login. Returns null if an ID is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new login provider. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

put.summary: Updates an existing login provider with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the login provider with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets all roles assigned to the specified user ID. Answers empty if noe are found.

put.summary: Assigns the specified roles to the user after dropping any existing assignments. Returns bad request if an Id is not found

post.summary: Adds a role to the user. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Drops a role from the user.

post.summary: Adds a tag to the user. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Drops a tag from the user. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Gets the value of the MANIFEST.MF property Implementation-Version as written by maven.

size.description: Size in bytes on the disk

accessTypeCode.description: Access type code that is valid for this site

origin.description: URL of the peer that provided this catalog

publisher.description: Company or organization name that is the publisher

size.description: Size in bytes on the disk

url.description: A URL to view more information

self.description: Boolean indicator, true if this entry refers to self

accessTypeCode.description: Access type code that is valid for this site

origin.description: URI of the peer that provided this object

ratingAverageTenths.description: Rating average in tenths; e.g., value 35 means 3.5

accessTypeCode.description: Access type code that is valid for this site

authors.description: Two-column table with author (name, contact) pairs

origin.description: URI of the peer that provided this item.

publisher.description: Company or organization name that is the publisher

sourceId.description: Peer ID where this was on-boarded; null indicates local

picture.description: User profile picture as byte array

verifyTokenHash.description: Verification token, sent as clear text, never included in response

providerCode.description: Login provider code valid for this site

providerUserId.description: User name at the login provider

msgSeverityCode.description: Message severity code valid for this site

notfDelvMechCode.description: Delivery mechanism code valid for this site

url.description: A URL to view more information
